certifications.title: SAP Certified Associate - SAP Business Data Cloud

projects.title: Helix
projects.description:
Technologies Used: HDFS, Hive, Impala, Oozie,Apache Pig ,Microstrategy

This project is to create a 360 degree view of customers and create a lake of data that exist as a source of truth for the complete organisation. Using big data technologies the data from different sources are stored in HDFS and modelled as per the use cases to give historical view from batch processing and near real time view from speed layer.The data lake will be used to provide support for various use cases including analytics, processing, storing and reporting of voluminous, rapidly changing, structured and unstructured data. The project is agile and follows lambda architecture with batch, speed and serving layers.

projects.title: DataMart
projects.description:
A DataMart is a repository of data gathered from operational data and other sources that is designed to serve a particular group of business users. The emphasis of a DataMart is on meeting the specific demands of a particular group of Business users in terms of analysis, content, presentation, and ease-of-use.

It is an integrated information system that is used to plan, schedule and control the analytical activities in an organization. The primary goal of a DataMart is to improve long-term growth and profitability through a better understanding of organizational behavior.

projects.title: Twitter Data Analytics
projects.description:
Technologies Used: OBIEE 11g, Talend, MySQL, Oracle 11g

This POC collects the tweets for a specific airline and performs sentiment analysis by retrieving and processing Twitter tweets using Talend, stores them in MySQL/Oracle 11g and presents the data in the form of reports for further analysis in OBIEE 11g. The reports shows the bad sentiments tweets, graphs showing the daily activites.

projects.title: Airline Data Model Using Graph DB Neo4j
projects.description:
Technologies Used: Neo4J, Talend, MySQL

This POC creates airline data model using Neo4j and Talend. This POC was developed to show connectivity of airline data to answer analytical questions and show capability in graph DB.

With this model we answer the key questions representing the data with relationships. The average taxi time airport wise, leading cause of departure delays, flights cancelled at each airport, reason for delay and represents the flight routes in a much simpler and interactive way. We check the Destinations to see if a non-stop or direct flight is available right away. If not, we can look at routes with one hop, and quickly check the Destination nodes of those Airports.

projects.title: Synergy
projects.description:
This project gives an insight and scope of Analysis to the Senior Management by looking into the various matrices available like AHT (Average Handling Time), Talk Time, Wrap Time, Calls Offered & Answered, and Calls Abandoned etc. 

It deals with the identification of the advisors and managers who has given degraded performance in the week and also tracks the monthly, Quarterly and Yearly stage as well.

This dashboard includes Inbound, Outbound and Back Office Campaigns. Based on this dashboard, performance of a single Process or whole site can be determined and any corrective measures can be put in a place to control any deviations.
Expected benefits from this implementation include:

• Better decision-making by IGT BPO’s customer using the Datawarehouse.
• Better integration with all the Business Processes of IGT BPO by using a common business platform.
• Better and meaningful meta-data management

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Principal Product Manager  |  Digital Transformation  |  Data & Analytics
receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the pleasure of working closely with Rahul for almost 4+ years where he served as a Tech Lead in our team. He consistently impressed us all with his exceptional skills and dedication to delivering high-quality solutions in multiple technologies including OBIEE , SAP Cloud based solutions , Data security.
He possesses a strong analytical mindset and expertise in designing, developing, and implementing innovative solutions that allow him to identify opportunities for optimization and improvement throughout the development lifecycle. He approaches every task with enthusiasm and a positive attitude, inspiring others in the team to strive for excellence like him. He has multiple times delivered un-imaginable solutions to very complex problems which we thought can't be delivered at all including very complex data security framework , applications and integrations.

I absolutely and whole-heartedly recommend Rahul for a Tech Lead / architect role to any organization seeking a talented and dedicated senior developer / tech lead / architect who can drive innovation and deliver results with precision and professionalism. He would undoubtedly be a valuable asset to any organization he joins.

experience.description:

•	Administering DNS, DHCP servers.

•	Providing hardware / software / network problem diagnosis / resolution for customer's end users.

Team Size : 38  

Project Overview
IT service management (ITSM or IT services) is a discipline for managing information technology (IT) systems, philosophically centered on the customer's perspective of IT's contribution to the business. ITSM stands in deliberate contrast to technology-centered approaches to IT management and business interaction. ITSM is a component of ITIL.

Responsibilities
Understaning customer issues and creating incident or request ticket for the same and routing it to appropriate team to work on it.
Working on scom console alerts.
Validating alerts with some suitable commands and depending on the O/P creating incident ticket for the same.

rawData.headline: SAP Technology Architect II S4 HANA Migration II S4 HANA Migration Assessment II SAP BTP Administrator II Screen Persona II Custom Code Simplification II SLT || SAP Retrofit || Solman Decommissioning || SAP ABAP
rawData.about:
•	A solution-oriented professional with nearly 16 years of rich & extensive experience in SAP ABAP, SAP HANA Migration and S4 HANA Migration Assessments.
•	Working on SAP ABAP Objects like Data Dictionary, Reports, Sap-script, Smart Forms, User-Exits, BADI’s, Enhancements, BTE’s, Dialog Programming, BDC, SAP Upgrades, Modularization Techniques, IDOCs, O-Data, Proxy, Workflows, LSMW, SAP-BTP Administration, S4 HANA Assessments, Restful ABAP Programming, Screen Persona Creation, Solution Manager-Custom Code Decommissioning Cockpit etc.
•	Leading a team of various ABAP Technical Consultants and their deliverables.
•	Worked on various roll-outs at US, China, Thailand, Brazil, India as an SAP-ABAP Developer with the role of developing, reviewing the code, analyzing the issues, unit testing and writing the technical specifications
•	Worked as an Onsite Coordinator for California (U.S) and Marco Polo (India) rollouts, direct interaction with the client and effort estimations, feasibility analysis, Requirement gathering and overall quality of deliverables

His responsibility includes - Requirement gathering, feasibility analysis , Build , Code review , testing , managing and helping Complete Project ABAP Team etc.

He is  handling a Team of 10 ABAP Consultant's and fully responsible for there work.

projects.title: Firmenich
projects.description:
This is an exclusive SAP Implementation and roll out project for Firmenich sites across the globe with responsibility of deliverables related to the FIRMENICH Implementation and support Project. Tickets are raised through change management system using Unicentre ticketing system. The project is divided into clusters where each cluster is implemented as an independent end to end implementation for a set of countries.
Firmenich was founded in 1895 in Geneva. Today, Firmenich is one of  the  largest private company in the fragrance and flavor industry worldwide with world market share of 14%.Firmenich has 19 production & manufacturing sites worldwide. Firmenich is dedicated to create high quality fragrances and flavors used by customers in their consumer brands. Firmenich clients are the world's number one multinational manufacturers of beauty, household and fabric care products, as well as pharmaceuticals, food & drinks like Pepsi, Coca-Cola and Colgate.

publications.title: Morality and the society
publications.description: Civilized humanity needs to be moral, but the scenario at present shows predominance of immorality. Morality is a device created by the thinking social animal, man. Man is social as long as the society survives and it has managed to service for ages. It is wrong to confuse morality with ethics, which has a narrow application in day to day conduct of individuals in various walks of life. Recently it has dawned upon educational institutions that in the absence of moral education, the coming generations are most likely to tend to move towards greater insensitivity in their daily life. Crime and beastliness will invade the civilization.

profileTopEducation.schoolName: Government College Of Engineering and Leather Technology

experience.description:
Responsible for developing and implementing a search project on homedepot.ca aimed
at facilitating seamless search experiences. Led the integration of efficient backend
systems to ensure swift retrieval and delivery of product search results. Resulted in
significantly enhanced user satisfaction and overall experience.

Responsibilities:

- Engineered RESTful APIs to empower business users, enabling
seamless uploading and downloading of files containing search terms. 

- Led the transition from Hybris to SOLR, streamlining search capabilities
and enhancing user experience through the implementation of
typeahead (auto-suggest) functionality. 

- Spearheaded the development of CRUD endpoints and a file download
endpoint for business users, facilitating the addition and modification
of keywords. This optimization redirected users to relevant category
pages upon search, improving platform usability.

MySalesView is a platform to track Associate's productivity by tracking their actual sales, the progress towards their assigned goals

Responsibilities: 

- Developed RESTful APIs to handle data retrieval and manipulation for
the mySalesView platform. 

- Collaborated with front-end developers to define API contracts and
data structures.
 
- Conducted testing and debugging using JUnit and Mockito.

- Implemented logging, monitoring, and error-handling mechanisms

During this period, I underwent extensive training in Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Angular, MySQL, Git, GitHub, Jenkins, JUnit, and Mockito, honing my skills in various facets of software development. Equipped with this comprehensive knowledge, I led a team of four individuals in the development of a robust project that seamlessly integrated these technologies.

Responsibilities:
As the leading member of the project team, my responsibilities encompassed:

- Task Distribution: I meticulously allocated tasks to team members based on their strengths and 
expertise, ensuring an equitable workload distribution.

- Guidance and Support: I provided guidance and support to team members, assisting them in 
overcoming challenges and ensuring alignment with project objectives.

- Collaboration: I fostered a collaborative environment, encouraging open communication and 
 facilitating knowledge sharing among team members.


Through effective leadership, collaboration, and technical expertise, our team successfully delivered a high-quality project that showcased the seamless integration of Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Angular, MySQL, Git, GitHub, Jenkins, JUnit, and Mockito.
